hero.title: Vacation Home Panoramablick Steinhuder Meer
hero.subtitle: Sauna, lake, and silence â€“ where stress melts away.
hero.description: Vacation house Panoramablick is a true paradise for those who want to treat themselves to a romantic getaway. Situated on the shores of the lake, with its own jetty and sauna for relaxing hours for two, this place offers everything your heart desires to forget about everyday life, enjoy the sunset in a private retreat surrounded by breathtaking nature - and let yourself be enchanted by the peace and togetherness. Here you can not only relax, but also rediscover yourself. A place for couples who want to rest together.

about.title: Discover Panoramablick
about.description: Experience peace, privacy, and luxury at Ferienhaus Panoramablick, with amenities like a private jetty, sauna, and secluded garden.

highlights.title: Why Stay at Panoramablick?
highlights.description: Discover the unique features that make your stay at Panoramablick unforgettable, combining luxury, privacy, and breathtaking views.

jetty.title: Private Jetty & Rowing Boat
jetty.description: Enjoy access to the lake directly from your private jetty and peaceful moments on the water.

sauna.title: Luxury Sauna

sunsets.title: Panoramic Views & Sunset Jetty

pets.title: Dogs Allowed
